name: YouTube – Minimalistic stylish look
description: This is basically just based off my other userstyle, Userstyles.org – Minimalistic stylish look. I decided to do this for YouTube as well. Please keep in mind that this style isn't completely done yet, if you find any issues let me know and I'll fix them!

user.name: Crystallis
user.about: Commenting and rating is always appreciated. ツ
